productRequests.title: Add tags for solutions
productRequests.description: Easier to search for solutions based on a specific stack.

productRequests.title: Add a dark theme option
productRequests.description: It would help people with light sensitivities and who prefer dark mode.

productRequests.title: Q&A within the challenge hubs
productRequests.description: Challenge-specific Q&A would make for easy reference.

productRequests.title: Add image/video upload to feedback
productRequests.description: Images and screencasts can enhance comments on solutions.

productRequests.title: Ability to follow others
productRequests.description: Stay updated on comments and solutions other people post.

productRequests.title: Preview images not loading
productRequests.description: Challenge preview images are missing when you apply a filter.

productRequests.title: More comprehensive reports
productRequests.description: It would be great to see a more detailed breakdown of solutions.

productRequests.title: Learning paths
productRequests.description: Sequenced projects for different goals to help people improve.

productRequests.title: One-click portfolio generation
productRequests.description: Add ability to create professional looking portfolio from profile.

productRequests.title: Bookmark challenges
productRequests.description: Be able to bookmark challenges to take later on.

productRequests.title: Animated solution screenshots
productRequests.description: Screenshots of solutions with animations don’t display correctly.

productRequests.title: Add micro-interactions
productRequests.description: Small animations at specific points can add delight.

comments.content: Awesome idea! Trying to find framework-specific projects within the hubs can be tedious
Please use fun, color-coded labels to easily identify them at a glance

Also, please allow styles to be applied based on system preferences. I would love to be able to browse Frontend Mentor in the evening after my device’s dark mode turns on without the bright background it currently has.

Second this! I do a lot of late night coding and reading. Adding a dark theme can be great for preventing eye strain and the headaches that result. It’s also quite a trend with modern apps and  apparently saves battery life.
Much easier to get answers from devs who can relate, since they've either finished the challenge themselves or are in the middle of it.
Right now, there is no ability to add images while giving feedback which isn't ideal because I have to use another app to show what I mean
Yes I'd like to see this as well. Sometimes I want to add a short video or gif to explain the site's behavior..
I also want to be notified when devs I follow submit projects on FEM. Is in-app notification also in the pipeline?
I've been saving the profile URLs of a few people and I check what they’ve been doing from time to time. Being able to follow them solves that
This would be awesome! It would be so helpful to see an overview of my code in a way that makes it easy to spot where things could be improved.
Yeah, this would be really good. I'd love to see deeper insights into my code!
Having a path through the challenges that I could follow would be brilliant! Sometimes I'm not sure which challenge would be the best next step to take. So this would help me navigate through them!
I haven't built a portfolio site yet, so this would be really helpful. Might it also be possible to choose layout and colour themes?!

This would be great! At the moment, I'm just starting challenges in order to save them. But this means the My Challenges section is overflowing with projects and is hard to manage. Being able to bookmark challenges would be really helpful.
I'd love to see this! It always makes me so happy to see little details like these on websites.
